titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: CRITICAL CARE UNIT FUNCTION - Description

div.p: The type of area to which the PATIENT was admitted during a CRITICAL CARE PERIOD. This is the principal clinical service provided within the WARD. Children and Young People Facilities (PATIENTS aged greater than or equal to 29 days to less than 19 years predominate) Neonatal Facilities (Patients aged less than 29 days on admission predominate) Other settings
